description.english: Join an affiliation
description.french: Rejoignez une affiliation
description.italian: Unisciti a una gang
description.spanish: Únete a una afiliación

description.english: Gain Rank 2 in any affiliation
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 2 dans n’importe quelle affiliation
description.italian: Raggiungi la 2? posizione in ogni gang
description.spanish: Consigue la clasificación 2 en cualquier afiliación

description.english: Gain Rank 3 in any affiliation
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 3 dans n’importe quelle affiliation
description.italian: Raggiungi la 3? posizione in ogni gang
description.spanish: Consigue la clasificación 3 en cualquier afiliación

displayName.german: Glück hat nichts damit zu tun

description.english: Win a 6-player online multiplayer tournament
description.french: Gagnez un tournoi multijoueur en ligne à 6 joueurs
description.italian: Vinci un torneo online da 6 giocatori in modalità multigiocatore
description.spanish: Gana un torneo multijugador online de 6 jugadores

description.english: Win a multiplayer Head-to-Head tournament
description.french: Gagnez un tournoi Tête à tête
description.italian: Vinci un torneo Testa a testa
description.spanish: Gana un torneo cara a cara

description.english: Play 100 multiplayer games
description.french: Jouez 100 parties multijoueurs
description.italian: Gioca 100 partite multigiocatore
description.spanish: Juega 100 partidas multijugador

description.english: Earn 100,000 chips from the Daily Cut
description.french: Obtenez 100 000 jetons en Jetons quotidiens
description.italian: Ottieni 100.000 chip dalle Chip giornaliere
description.spanish: Gana 100 000 fichas de la cantidad diaria

description.english: Win 50 multiplayer Head-to-Head tournaments
description.french: Gagnez 50 tournois Tête à tête
description.italian: Vinci 50 tornei testa a testa
description.spanish: Gana 50 torneos cara a cara

description.english: Knock out 100 players in tournament play
description.french: Éliminez 100 joueurs en tournoi
description.italian: Metti KO 100 giocatori durante i tornei
description.spanish: Derrota a 100 jugadores en un torneo

description.english: Bust 100 players in ring games
description.french: Bustez 100 joueurs dans des Ring games
description.italian: Busta 100 giocatori nei ring game
description.spanish: Despluma a 100 jugadores en partidas de dinero

description.english: Reach 1 million bankroll
description.french: Atteignez une cagnotte de 1 million
description.italian: Fai in modo che il tuo bankroll raggiunga 1 milione
description.spanish: Alcanza 1 millón de fondos

description.english: Knock out all 5 players in any 6 player tournament
description.french: Éliminez les 5 autres joueurs dans un tournoi à 6 joueurs
description.italian: Metti KO 5 giocatori in un torneo da 6 giocatori
description.spanish: Elimina a los 5 jugadores en un torneo de 6 jugadores

description.english: Reach 1 billion bankroll
description.french: Atteignez une cagnotte de 1 milliard
description.italian: Fai in modo che il tuo bankroll raggiunga 1 miliardo
description.spanish: Alcanza 1 billón de fondos

description.english: Be dealt a Blackjack as your hole cards
description.german: Ass und 10 als Hole Cards erhalten
description.french: Obtenez un As et un 10 au trou
description.italian: Ricevi un asso e un dieci come hole card
description.spanish: Recibe un as y un diez en tus cartas de la mano

description.english: Purchase 10 outfits
description.french: Achetez 10 tenues
description.italian: Acquista 10 abiti
description.spanish: Compra 10 trajes

description.english: Play 50 games in the Deck Casino Venue
description.french: Jouez 50 parties dans le Casino « Deck »
description.italian: Gioca 50 partite nel Deck Casino
description.spanish: Juega 50 partidas en el escenario del Casino de la Baraja

description.english: Play 50 Games in the Kleaners Venue
description.french: Jouez 50 parties chez les Nettoyeurs
description.italian: Gioca 50 partite nel Kleaners
description.spanish: Juega 50 partidas en el escenario de la Lavandería

description.english: Play 50 Games in the Renegade Venue
description.french: Jouez 50 parties au Renégat
description.italian: Gioca 50 partite nel Rinnegato
description.spanish: Juega 50 partidas en el escenario de El Renegado

description.english: Win 5 hands in a row in a multiplayer game
description.german: In einem Mehrspieler-Spiel 5 Hände hintereinander gewinnen
description.french: Gagnez 5 mains à la suite dans une partie multijoueur
description.italian: Vinci 5 mani di fila in una partita multigiocatore
description.spanish: Gana 5 manos seguidas en una partida multijugador

description.english: Collect your Daily Cut 5 times in a row without missing a consecutive bonus
description.german: Täglichen Bonus 5x hintereinander kassieren, ohne einen Bonus zu verpassen
description.french: Collectez vos Jetons quotidiens 5 fois de suite sans rater aucun bonus consécutif
description.italian: Raccogli le chip giornaliere 5 volte di seguito senza perdere il bonus consecutivo
description.spanish: Recoge tu cantidad diaria 5 veces seguidas sin perderte una bonificación consecutiva

description.english: Bust 2 or more players in the same hand
description.german: 2 oder mehr Spieler in einer Hand abzocken
description.french: Bustez 2 joueurs ou plus lors de la même main
description.italian: Busta 2 o più giocatori nella stessa mano
description.spanish: Despluma a 2 jugadores o más en la misma mano

description.english: Complete a challenge
description.french: Terminez un défi
description.italian: Completa una sfida
description.spanish: Completa un desafío

description.english: Complete 10 challenges
description.french: Terminez 10 défis
description.italian: Completa 10 sfide
description.spanish: Completa 10 desafíos

description.english: Change affiliations
description.french: Changez d’affiliation
description.italian: Cambia gang
description.spanish: Cambia de afiliación

displayName.english: In the Land of the Blind...
displayName.spanish: En el país de los ciegos…

description.english: Go All-In without looking at your hole cards and win
description.german: Ohne die Hole Cards anzusehen All-In gehen und gewinnen
description.french: Faites tapis sans regarder vos cartes au trou et gagnez
description.italian: Vai all-in senza neanche guardare le tue hole card e vinci
description.spanish: Juégatelo todo sin mirar tus cartas de la mano y gana

description.english: Win a hand that you made on the River
description.german: Eine Hand gewinnen, die mit dem River erzielt wurde
description.french: Gagnez une main formée à la rivière
description.italian: Vinci una mano col river
description.spanish: Gana una mano con la carta del river

description.english: Win a hand with 7 2 offsuit as your hole cards
description.german: Eine Hand mit 7 und 2 in unterschiedlichen Farben als Hole Cards gewinnen
description.french: Remportez une main avec les cartes au trou sept et deux dépareillées
description.italian: Vinci una mano avendo 7 e 2 di semi diversi come hole card
description.spanish: Gana una mano con un 2-7 en tus cartas de la mano

description.english: Quadruple your buy-in during a single multiplayer ring game
description.german: Den Buy-In während eines einzigen Mehrspieler-Ring-Games vervierfachen
description.french: Quadruplez votre buy-in au cours d’un Ring game multijoueur
description.italian: Quadruplica il tuo buy in durante un solo ring game in multigiocatore
description.spanish: Cuadruplica tu cuota de entrada durante una partida de dinero multijugador

description.english: Complete the tutorial
description.french: Terminez le tutoriel
description.italian: Completa il tutorial
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial

description.english: Win a hand with the Ace of Spades or Clubs and 8 of Spades or Clubs as your hole cards
description.german: Eine Hand mit Pik- oder Kreuz-Ass und Pik- oder Kreuz-8 als Hole Cards gewinnen
description.french: Remportez une main avec un As et huit noirs au trou
description.italian: Vinci una mano avendo l'asso di picche o di fiori e un 8 di picche o di fiori come hole card
description.spanish: Gana una mano con el as de picas o tréboles y el 8 de picas o tréboles en tus cartas de la mano

description.english: Own a smoke and a drink
description.german: Eine Zigarette oder Zigarre und einen Drink besitzen
description.french: Possédez une cigarette et une boisson
description.italian: Fatti una fumata e una bevuta
description.spanish: Ten una bebida y algo para fumar

description.english: Change your gender

description.italian: Cambia sesso
description.spanish: Cambia de sexo

description.english: Place 1st, 2nd, or 3rd in a 6 player multiplayer Tournament in The Deck Casino, The Kleaners, Motherland Meats, The Renegade, and The Diamond Suite
description.german: Erreiche den 1., 2. oder 3. Platz in einem 6-Spieler-Multiplayer-Turnier in „Das Deck Casino“, „The Kleaners“, „Mutterland-Fleisch“, „Der Renegat“ und „Die Karo-Suite“

description.italian: Classificati al 1º, 2º o 3º posto in un torneo multigiocatore a 6 partecipanti al Deck Casino, ai Kleaners, alle Carni della madrepatria, al Rinnegato, e alla Suite dei quadri
description.spanish: Termina 1.º, 2.º o 3.º en un torneo multijugador de 6 jugadores en el Casino de la Baraja, en la Lavandería, en Carnes de la Patria, en El Renegado, y en la Sala de Los Diamantes
